title: Poster, "Poster Design for Kootz Gallery "Serpan" Exhibition", 1958
medium: Lithography in green and black ink on white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted at center right in alternating black and white ink: SERPAN
At lower left in green ink: KOOTZ GALLERY
In black ink: 21 October- 8 November 1958/ 1018 Madison Avenue at 79th New York 21 New York/ 048-1471-cable:galkootz new york- closed mondays
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Poster design for the "Serpan" exhibition at the Kootz Gallery. The poster has a large black and green K above the Kootz gallery information. Next to the K is an image of a painting from the exhibition. Above the image and behind the word Serpan is a green design that looks like a vertical S.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Poster Design for Kootz Gallery "Serpan" Exhibition", 1958.
1958. Lithography in green and black ink on white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-115.
